=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Jackson 5ive Complete Series
Review Date: 2014/12/15
Store: Joel Cooper  (Actor),     Donald Fullilove  (Actor),     Arthur Rankin Jr.  (Director),     Jules Bass  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
Product Description: ['For the FIRST-TIME EVER this complete animated series, that includes 23 FULL-LENGTH EPISODES and 46 ORIGINAL JACKSON 5IVE SONGS, is available to fans everywhere! With 2 complete songs in each episode you can join JACKIE, TITO, JERMAINE, MARLON and MICHAEL on tour, laughing at their crazy adventures and singing your heart out along the way GROOVY!']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Animation', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, NTSC, Original recording remastered, Full Screen', 'Contributor': 'Joel Cooper, Donald Fullilove, Edmund Sylvers, Craig Grandy, Jules Bass, Mike Martinez, Arthur Rankin Jr.Joel Cooper, Donald Fullilove, Edmund Sylvers, Craig Grandy, Jules Bass, Mike Martinez, Arthur Rankin Jr.  See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 0.7 x 5.4 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': '037117042135', 'Director': 'Arthur Rankin Jr., Jules Bass', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, NTSC, Original recording remastered, Full Screen', 'Run time': '8 hours and 26 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 15, 2013', 'Actors': 'Joel Cooper, Donald Fullilove, Mike Martinez, Edmund Sylvers, Craig Grandy', 'Studio': 'Classic Media', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: Excellent Quality ts by for a 1970's reedited cartoon.  I loved reliving some great childhood moments by watching this excellent video.
Review Title: Excellent Quality ts by for a 1970's reedited cartoon
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Richard Simmons Sweatin' to the Oldies VHS
Review Date: 2014/12/15
Store: Richard Simmons  (Actor),     Sally Knyvette  (Actor),     E.H. Shipley  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: VHS Tape
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Exercise & Fitness
Product Description: ['Product description', "Richard Simmons Sweatin' to the Oldies [VHS] (View amazon detail page) ASIN: 6301729897", 'Amazon.com', 'Richard Simmons is the king of motivational exercise, especially if you\'re a beginner. This video workout is a dance party simulating a class reunion, with an energizing live band playing lively hits from the \'50s and \'60s, such as "It\'s My Party and I\'ll Cry If I Want To," "Great Balls of Fire," and "Dancing in the Streets." The singers and musicians sometimes come offstage and dance with the exercisers, adding to the energy and festivity. The choreography is very simple, low impact, light intensity, and appropriate for beginners and overweight exercisers. (You may not get your heart rate up if you\'re very fit, although you\'ll enjoy the music.) Richard doesn\'t do much in the way of cueing--he assumes you\'ll just follow along. His onscreen class has women and men of all body shapes and sizes, and everyone is having a blast. You will, too. At the end, the exercisers dance down the floor and the screen flashes how many pounds they\'ve lost--several have lost more than 100 pounds. (22 minutes of aerobics, total 43 minutes with warm-up, cool down, and stretch.)', '--Joan Price']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.08 Ounces', 'Director': 'E.H. Shipley', 'Run time': '45 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 15, 1994', 'Date First Available': 'December 7, 2006', 'Actors': 'Richard Simmons, Sally Knyvette, Paul Darrow, Jan Chappell, Michael Keating', 'Studio': 'Warner Home Video'}
Review Text: Homemade video man would be okay if Richard Simmons would lower his pilot light enough to be tolerable to a heterosexual an who was trying to give him a chance.  Will continue search for a slightly less female oriented dance aerobic video.
Review Title: Homemade video man would be okay if Richard Simmons would ...
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

Categories: Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Documentary

Average Rating: 4.8

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eddie Murphy - Delirious
Review Date: 2015/09/01
Store: Eddie Murphy  (Actor, Writer),     James Argiro  (Actor),     Bruce Gowers  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
Product Description: ["Taped live and in concert at Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C., in August 1983, Edie Murphy's Delirious captires Eddie Murphy's wild and outrageous stand-up comedy act, which he had performed in New York and 18 other cities across the U/S/ to standing-room-only audiences. Eddie's comedy was groundbreaking, completely new, razor sharp and very funny."]
Average Rating: 4.7

Review Text: Decades later it is still the funniest standup comedy tape ever made.
Review Title: Still the best of all time
Rating: 5.0

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history indicates a clear preference for nostalgic entertainment, especially from the 1970s and 1980s. High ratings (averages above 4.5) highlight a strong sentiment towards quality and enjoyment, particularly in animated and comedic content. Users value remastered and complete collections, as evidenced by recurring purchases of series and boxed sets, suggesting a desire for thorough and comprehensive experiences over singular items.

Common themes include a focus on children's programming and fitness videos, favoring lighthearted, fun, and accessible content. The presence of well-known personalities like Richard Simmons and Eddie Murphy indicates an inclination towards recognizable figures that evoke fond memories and are known for their entertainment value.

Quality is prioritized in purchases, with ratings reflecting satisfaction regarding the production value of older titles. However, there appears to be some price sensitivity demonstrated by comments on value and legality of formats, hinting the consumer appreciates affordability along with good quality.

Overall, this individual values nostalgic, high-quality media, with a preference for well-rated options that evoke personal memories or provide light entertainment, showcasing both a lean towards childhood favorites and a functional approach to fitness and comedy.

target_interaction.title: but that said it is fun to watch
target_interaction.text: Story is a little wacky, but that said it is fun to watch.  Should make for a nice date night video.
